Text.Value: He did. He wants you to 'keep your sacred vow' and name a spell after him.

EditorData.NodeContext: a smile at the memory, even though she's upset

Text.Value: Do you two need anything? Something to eat or drink, perhaps?

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere

Text.Value: How bad was it? In Moonrise?

EditorData.NodeContext: uncharacteristically hesitant of rolan. He's worried about his siblings' mental state but doesn't know how to ask

Text.Value: No, not another word. This isn't your fault.

EditorData.NodeContext: fierce and protective of your little brother

Text.Value: No splitting up, ever again, you hear?

EditorData.NodeContext: half joking half serious

Text.Value: The cultists and their bastard god are to blame. Nobody else.

EditorData.NodeContext: fierce and protective of your little brother

Text.Value: I'm sorry, Rolan.

EditorData.NodeContext: mad at yourself, grieving for your siser

Text.Value: Sorry, I'm just... tired. Of this - of everything.
Did Cal say anything? Before he... died?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Lia as she looks down, avoiding eye contact with Rolan, and clearly traumatised

Text.Value: Gods, I'd forgotten that. In my defence, it was his birthday and I'd had several glasses of wine.

EditorData.NodeContext: a slight laugh at the memory

Text.Value: For once we are in agreement.

EditorData.NodeContext: said with a smile

Text.Value: You know what I mean.
Not here. Lia deserves a proper send-off - and a proper memorial.

EditorData.NodeContext: sad but also determined to give lia a good send off

Text.Value: I'm glad you're here.
We should do something for Lia. A gravestone, or something.

EditorData.NodeContext: grief, upset, trying to be matter of fact but not quite managing it

Text.Value: Mind if we talk about that later, Rolan?

EditorData.NodeContext: trying to keep it light but is clearly upset at the thought of moonrise

Text.Value: Same.
Really? You seem a little banged up.

EditorData.NodeContext: curious and worried, rolan looks a bit battered

Text.Value: Deal.

EditorData.NodeContext: said with a smile

Text.Value: We should have a little party when we reach the city, like we did for mum.

EditorData.NodeContext: sad at the thought but also smiling at the memory

Text.Value: And I you.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere

Text.Value: How are you holding up?

EditorData.NodeContext: concern, speaking to rolan

Text.Value: I'm perfectly fine.

EditorData.NodeContext: a lie said with a shrug

Text.Value: You look like shit.

EditorData.NodeContext: to your brother - he's mourning, and genuinely does look like shit - you're trying to sympathise rather than being harsh

Text.Value: ...Yes, well, this place has been abandoned for some time.

EditorData.NodeContext: he drank the bar dry but is too ashamed to admit it. Looking away as answers

Text.Value: How did you even find this place?

EditorData.NodeContext: looking in wonder about last light inn

Text.Value: That 'little party' lasted from sundown to sunrise. Lia would like that.

EditorData.NodeContext: sad at the thought but also smiling at the memory

Text.Value: Perfectly fine. The accommodation leaves much to be desired, but it will suffice for now.

EditorData.NodeContext: you're worse for wear but pretending otherwise

Text.Value: I'm fine. The bar looks cleared out, anyway.

EditorData.NodeContext: reassuring, curious about the bottles strewn about the bar

Text.Value: I'm all right. You?
Why do you think he plied you with wine in the first place?
Of course, of course! Take all the time you need.

EditorData.NodeContext: worried he's upset his siblings ans is backtracking, trying to be concerned but sounds awkward

Text.Value: Little of note.

EditorData.NodeContext: a lie said with a shrug

Text.Value: I'm perfectly fine.
He even had a suggestion - 'Cal's Irresistible Charm'.

EditorData.NodeContext: grinning wryly at the thought

Text.Value: Are you hurt?
Heh. And I thought I was the mother hen.

EditorData.NodeContext: a big smile, she's pleased rolan is fussing over them

Text.Value: What have you been doing since we got separated?

EditorData.NodeContext: curious and worried, rolan looks a bit battered

Text.Value: It could be a lot worse, Rolan - trust us.

EditorData.NodeContext: touch of horror creeping into her voice as she thinks of moonrise

Text.Value: Never mind that - do you need anything? Something to eat or drink, perhaps?

EditorData.NodeContext: concerned for his little brother

Text.Value: We're doing all right. Just... glad to see you.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere

Text.Value: Thanks.

EditorData.NodeContext: abrupt, annoyed

Synopsis: Cal and/or Lia has been rescued from Moonrise. They have reunited with Rolan and are reminscing/checking up on one another. This occurs after the reunion scene.
